ValidationRule.description: This validation rule ensures that when the Account record type is "Committee_Reviewer/ Provider," and the Committee picklist is set to "EDRD Advisory Committee" then Committee Name field should left blank.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( CONTAINS($UserRole.Name, "EDRD"), ISPICKVAL(Committee__pc, "EDRD Advisory Committee"), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Committee_Name__pc, "")), OR(Record_Type_Name__c = 'Committee_Reviewer', Record_Type_Name__c = 'Provider') )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: When Committee is EDRD Advisory Committee then Committee Name cannot be selected.
